column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ According to a preliminary press release
column4: an RX350 with state license plate 17 2-0845 crashed into a road divider
column5: trashing the car.------The suspected drunken driver got out the car
column6: removing a gun and hailed a motorcycle taxi which took him away from the scene. Although no shots appear to have been fired
column7: the hapless driver dropped a live bullet in his getaway
column8: which took place shortly before midnight on April 5
